comments:
Description:
Exception occurs when specify a column as level which column has already used in measure[1101]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070516-1011

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a cube
2, in cube builder, specify column1 as measure
3, specify column1 as one dimension's level

Expected result:
No exception occurs

Actual result:
java.lang.ClassCastException occurs after insert the level

Error log:
